quest.name: Mourn in Passing
journal: Alphinaud is keen to inform Vidofnir of Lord Ravana's defeat.
Alphinaud is eager to begin the ascent of Sohm Al. Return to Anyx Trine in the Dravanian forelands, and report your victory over the Gnath's god to Vidofnir.

Vidofnir listens in disbelief as Ysayle relates the circumstances of Lord Ravana's defeat. True to her word, the dragon vows that she will open the way to Sohm Al...once you have negotiated the cavern of Mourn. Climb the central tower of Anyx Trine to the second floor, then fight your way through Mourn's denizens to join Vidofnir on the threshold of the path to the summit.

After battling your way through the cavern of Mourn, Vidofnir opens the path forward, as promised. Before taking her leave, however, the dragon warns that you will not be welcome in the domain beyond. Prepare to face the mightiest of Nidhogg's minions, on your way to the summit of Sohm Al.

※Challenge Sohm Al with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.

You have defeated Tioman, the consort of Nidhogg, and restored light to your Crystal of Earth in so doing. Soon after the dragon's death, however, Estinien is overwhelmed by Nidhogg's feelings of rage and anguish─an unwelcome reminder of the connection he shares with the great wyrm. Put any doubts you may feel to one side, and continue your journey into the Churning Mists.
You have arrived at the summit of Sohm Al. Trouble Alphinaud for his thoughts on finally having reached the mountain's lofty peak.

Alphinaud seems awed and humbled to be standing at the summit of Eorzea's highest mountain. The Churning Mists stretch out before you, beckoning you on towards the culmination of your arduous journey.
objectives: Meet Vidofnir in the cavern of Mourn.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Shall we be on our way to Anyx Trine, then? I would not have the dragons think that we have forgotten our bargain.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Ahh, you should have seen the boy fretting... 'Twas a sight to behold!

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Tease him no more. Master Alphinaud is to be applauded for his sense of responsibility. Given his years, 'tis little wonder the burden weighs heavy upon his shoulders...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: 'Tis natural for him to feel concern for his companions.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Vidofnir will be pleased to hear of Lord Ravana's defeat, and of his pledge to recall his soldiers.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Will the dragon now honor her word? That remains to be seen...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: You should be the one to break the news. The victory was yours, after all.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Thou art returned, Little One. Hast thou abandoned thine ill-conceived contest with the Gnath?

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Nay, my friend, we return in triumph. By Forename's hand was the beastmen's god, Lord Ravana, laid low.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: In his overconfidence, the primal swore to withdraw his followers from your lands in the event of his defeat─a promise we believe he will keep. The Gnath shall trouble you no longer.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: The deity is slain, then...? How didst thou contend with his biting blades!? ...But the particulars matter not. Thou hast fulfilled thy promise, and I shall fulfill mine.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Attend me, mortals: hie you unto the deepest reaches of Mourn, and there shall you find Halo─the altar from which you may begin your ascent to the summit of Sohm Al.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: But be fairly warned: the minions of Nidhogg shall not lightly suffer your presence on that sacred mount. By your struggles within the cavern shall I judge your party possessed of sufficient fortitude to proceed.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: We shall not disappoint you, Vidofnir.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: If memory serves, the cavern of Mourn is entered from the second floor of the central tower. Let us begin the climb.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Be fairly warned: the minions of Nidhogg shall not lightly suffer your presence on the sacred mount. By your struggles within the cavern of Mourn shall I judge your party possessed of sufficient fortitude to proceed.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Well done, Little One. As promised, I shall open the way to Sohm Al's summit for thee and thy companions.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: Heed me now, children of man: the domain you seek to enter hath not seen visitors of your kind in nigh on a thousand years. Though I freely grant you passage, your presence will not be welcomed.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: To my kin, this mountain is revered as holy ground and resting place both─ware you the minions of Nidhogg during your ascent, for 'tis certain they shall take great offense at your intrusion.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: We are grateful for your warnings, gentle Vidofnir.

dialogue.name: VIDOFNIR
dialogue.text: My final words are for thee, dragoon: have care to keep the stolen power thou wieldest in check, lest it breed further despair.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Estinien...?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: The way is open. Let us not tarry here.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: A moment! Shall we blindly forge on, knowing the dangers that await us? Tioman herself is said to guard this peak.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I do not fear Nidhogg's consort. Any dragon foolish enough to bar our path shall feel the sting of my lance.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Spoken like a true butcher! Need I remind you that we are come to parley a peace!?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Let us be clear, heretic: 'twas to save Ishgard and her people that I first lent my support to this doubtful venture. And 'tis for their sake that I go now to speak with Hraesvelgr.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: But I said nothing of Tioman. Should the opportunity present itself to rid my people of one of their deadliest enemies, I shall take it. That is my duty as Azure Dragoon.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: You are beyond redemption...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will accomplish nothing by bickering. If we are to meet with Hraesvelgr, our path leads up the mountain.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We shall defend ourselves if attacked, but avoid conflict wherever possible. What other choice do we have?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We shall defend ourselves if attacked, but avoid conflict wherever possible. What other choice do we have?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I feel the weight of Dravanian rancor pressing down upon me...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: A dragon lost to anger is beyond all control. This I learned to my sorrow when I unleashed the Horde upon Ishgard...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Tioman, consort of Nidhogg, we beseech you─grant us safe passage to the mountain's summit. We mean you no harm.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: As I thought. Blind to reason like all the rest. If you would see our mission to its conclusion, you know what must be done.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Such rage and rancor... Is there truly no other way?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename!?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: 'Twould seem Tioman was the last. I sense no other dragons nearby.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What is happening!?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: <gasp> Nidhogg... He roars.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: He knows we are here, then?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: His fury... <gasp> It bleeds through the Eye.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Fear not, I am yet my own master...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: ...But that damned wyrm's wrath burns hotter than flame... Come, the heart of the dragons' homeland yet lies before us.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Thus do we add another link to the chain of vengeance. Oh, Saint Shiva, when will it end...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We have reached it at last... The peak of Sohm Al.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: 'Tis said to be the highest mountain in all of Eorzea, you know. I thought it cold in Coerthas, but the air here carries the chill of a dozen winters...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: We stand within the sacred homeland of dragons, beneath the sky that is Hraesvelgr's domain. Our quest nears its end, Forename...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Ahhh... I feel the wyrm's anger. His lair is not far...not far at all.
